title: Back, for the Wrong Reasons
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: State of the Lakers, war in Ukraine and more
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones discusses the state of the Lakers, as well as how culpable star LeBron James is and should be for the issues that plague them (1:34). Plus, the war in Ukraine as it relates to American displays of patriotism via sport (19:04), an IYHH including the FBI warning us about a "funny money" ad during the Super Bowl (28:36), and your voicemails from a wild story you heard at the barbershop (41:25)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @LloydAlcynna says Black buyers are getting pushed out of the housing market faster than anyone else: https://bit.ly/3poOwZv
  2. @JasonAten says if you scanned that QR code from the Super Bowl, the FBI has a warning for you https://bit.ly/3M9XV0N
  3. @dustingardiner shares that the outcome of a new bill would determine if Cal Berkley has to cut thousands from its freshman class: https://bit.ly/3BY4AGI
